preqs: OHS1000 & Must be enrolled in MADA course or by permission

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000562}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000}

description: This unit will emphasise the principle role illustration plays in the practice of graphic design. While continuing to develop individual illustration skills, students will be expected to realise their images in their intended contexts, such as packaging design, shopping bags, book covers, posters, advertisements, or other traditional graphic design formats. While being exposed to traditional image making processes students will also be encouraged to explore more experimental methods. A mix of hand generated imagery and digital methods will be encouraged.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
